chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall n p k : nat, (p + k < n)%nat -> forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_derive (fun z : R_AbsRing => partial_derive p k f x z) y

Premises:
ex_diff_n = fix ex_diff_n (f : R -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R) {struct n} : Prop := continuity_2d_pt f x y /\ match n with | 0%nat => True | S n0 => ex_derive (fun z : R_AbsRing => f z y) x /\ ex_derive (fun z : R_AbsRing => f x z) y /\ ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f z v) u) n0 x y /\ ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f u z) v) n0 x y end : (R -> R -> R) -> nat -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope R_scope R_scope]
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
ex_derive = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (f : K -> V) (x : K) => exists l : V, is_derive f x l : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K), (K -> V) -> K -> Prop Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope _]
R_AbsRing = AbsRing.Pack R {| AbsRing.base := {| Ring.base := R_AbelianGroup_mixin; Ring.mixin := R_Ring_mixin |}; AbsRing.mixin := R_AbsRing_mixin |} R : AbsRing
*** [ R : Set ]
partial_derive = fun (m k : nat) (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) => Derive_n (fun t : R => Derive_n (fun z : R => f t z) k y) m x : nat -> nat -> (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope]
ex_diff_n_ex_deriv_inf_1 : forall n p k : nat, (p + k < n)%nat -> forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_derive (fun z : R => partial_derive p k f z y) x
ex_diff_n_deriv : forall n p q : nat, (p + q <= n)%nat -> forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_diff_n (partial_derive p q f) (n - (p + q)) x y
ex_diff_n_deriv_aux2 : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f (S n) x y -> ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f u z) v) n x y
ex_diff_n_m : forall n m : nat, (m <= n)%nat -> forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_diff_n f m x y
partial_derive_ext_loc : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (p q : nat) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v = g u v) x y -> partial_derive p q f x y = partial_derive p q g x y
ex_diff_n_deriv_aux1 : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f (S n) x y -> ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f z v) u) n x y
ex_derive_scal : forall (f : R -> R) (k x : R), ex_derive f x -> ex_derive (fun x0 : R => k * f x0) x
is_derive_scal : forall (f : R -> R) (x k df : R), is_derive f x df -> is_derive (fun x0 : R => k * f x0) x (k * df)
partial_derive_add_zero : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (p q r s : nat) (x y : R), q = 0%nat \/ r = 0%nat -> partial_derive p q (partial_derive r s f) x y = partial_derive (p + r) (q + s) f x y
ex_diff_n_ext_loc : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v = g u v) x y -> ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_diff_n g n x y
ex_derive_div : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : R), ex_derive f x -> ex_derive g x -> g x <> 0 -> ex_derive (fun y : R_AbsRing => f y / g y) x
ex_derive_inv : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), ex_derive f x -> f x <> 0 -> ex_derive (fun y : R => / f y) x
differential = fun (p : nat) (f : R -> R -> R) (x y dx dy : R) => sum_f_R0 (fun m : nat => C p m * partial_derive m (p - m) f x y * dx ^ m * dy ^ (p - m)) p : nat -> (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [nat_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope]
Nat.le_lt_add_lt : forall n m p q : nat, (n <= m)%nat -> (p + m < q + n)%nat -> (p < q)%nat
is_derive_filterdiff : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) (dfx : R -> R -> R) (dfy : R), locally (x, y) (fun u : R * R => is_derive (fun z : R_AbsRing => f z (snd u)) (fst u) (dfx (fst u) (snd u))) -> is_derive (fun z : R => f x z) y dfy -> continuous (fun u : R * R => dfx (fst u) (snd u)) (x, y) -> filterdiff (fun u : R * R => f (fst u) (snd u)) (locally (x, y)) (fun u : R * R => plus (scal (fst u) (dfx x y)) (scal (snd u) dfy))
plus_lt_reg_l : forall n m p : nat, (p + n < p + m)%nat -> (n < m)%nat
continuity_2d_pt_ext_loc : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v = g u v) x y -> continuity_2d_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt g x y
ex_derive_mult : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : R), ex_derive f x -> ex_derive g x -> ex_derive (fun x0 : R => f x0 * g x0) x
ex_derive_pow : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R), ex_derive f x -> ex_derive (fun x0 : R => f x0 ^ n) x
ex_derive_Reals_1 : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), derivable_pt f x -> ex_derive f x
is_lim' = fun (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar.Rbar) => match l with | Rbar.Finite l0 => forall eps : posreal, Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => Rabs (f y - l0) < eps) | Rbar.p_infty => forall M : R, Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => M < f y) | Rbar.m_infty => forall M : R, Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => f y < M) end : (R -> R) -> Rbar.Rbar -> Rbar.Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _ _]
Derive_pow : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R), ex_derive f x -> Derive (fun x0 : R => f x0 ^ n) x = INR n * Derive f x * f x ^ Init.Nat.pred n
Derive_plus : forall (f g : R_AbsRing -> R_NormedModule) (x : R_AbsRing), ex_derive f x -> ex_derive g x -> Derive (fun x0 : R => f x0 + g x0) x = Derive f x + Derive g x
is_derive_inv : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), is_derive f x l -> f x <> 0 -> is_derive (fun y : R => / f y) x (- l / f x ^ 2)
continuity_2d_pt = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) => forall eps : posreal, locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f x y) < eps) x y : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Derive_minus : forall (f g : R_AbsRing -> R_NormedModule) (x : R_AbsRing), ex_derive f x -> ex_derive g x -> Derive (fun x0 : R => f x0 - g x0) x = Derive f x - Derive g x
Nat.add_le_mono : forall n m p q : nat, (n <= m)%nat -> (p <= q)%nat -> (n + p <= m + q)%nat
locally_2d_1d_const_x : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally y (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P x t)
Derive_correct : forall (f : R_AbsRing -> R_NormedModule) (x : R_AbsRing), ex_derive f x -> is_derive f x (Derive f x)
Record mixin_of (M : Type) : Type := Mixin { ball : M -> R -> M -> Prop; ax1 : forall (x : M) (e : posreal), ball x e x; ax2 : forall (x y : M) (e : R), ball x e y -> ball y e x; ax3 : forall (x y z : M) (e1 e2 : R), ball x e1 y -> ball y e2 z -> ball x (e1 + e2) z } For mixin_of: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Mixin: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
Nat.add_lt_mono_l : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat < -> (p + n < p + m)%nat
locally_2d_1d_const_y : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P t y)
is_derive_pow : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x l : R), is_derive f x l -> is_derive (fun x0 : R => f x0 ^ n) x (INR n * l * f x ^ Init.Nat.pred n)
locally_2d_impl_strong : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => locally_2d P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
Nat.add_lt_cases : forall n m p q : nat, (n + m < p + q)%nat -> (n < p)%nat \/ (m < q)%nat
Derive_n_comp : forall (f : R -> R) (n m : nat) (x : R), Derive_n (Derive_n f m) n x = Derive_n f (n + m) x
Derive_n_ext : forall (f g : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R), (forall t : R, f t = g t) -> Derive_n f n x = Derive_n g n x
is_derive_mult : forall (f g : R -> R) (x df dg : R), is_derive f x df -> is_derive g x dg -> is_derive (fun t : R => f t * g t) x (df * g x + f x * dg)
locally_2d_forall : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall u v : R, P u v) -> locally_2d P x y
ex_derive_n = fun (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R_AbsRing) => match n with | 0%nat => True | S n0 => ex_derive (Derive_n f n0) x end : (R -> R) -> nat -> R_AbsRing -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]

```coq
intros n p k H f x y H0.
apply ex_diff_n_ex_deriv_inf_1 with (f:=fun z => partial_derive p k f z y) (x:=x).
exact H0.
Qed.
```
